meaningMnemonic:
The <kanji>real</kanji> <kanji>thing</kanji> is the <vocabulary>real thing</vocabulary>, aka the <vocabulary>real deal</vocabulary>. 

If you learned 本 as <kanji>book</kanji> you can also think of this word as the "book thing." What is this book thing? Is it the real version of the book? Is it the real deal? If so, I'll pay you a million.
readingMnemonic: The readings are on'yomi plus kun'yomi (kun'yomi is 物). You learned the reading of the kanji 本 and also the vocabulary reading of 物, so you should be able to read it.
